Package net.dougvalenta.scriptorium

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Escaper
    An interface for escaping characters being output to an Appendable.
    FluentAppendable<THIS extends FluentAppendable<THIS>>
    An extension of Appendable that uses a recursive type parameter for improved fluency.
    FluentNode<P>
    A fluent primitive for nested fluent interfaces.
    Inscribable<I,THIS extends Inscribable<I,THIS>>
    Implementers may choose to pass another type <I> to consumers, e.g.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Whitespace
    A wrapper class for outputting whitespace characters to an Appendable.
